content.value:
I do ♥ vim's editing power.

Wanted to make a mass edit across hundreds of blocks in dozens of files.

1) Identify:
:vimgrep /pattern/ **/*.html

2) make bulk change
:cdo «copy the line to the target, modify it as desired, return to previous line, remove portion»

3) save
:wa
